title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7651.8 - Independent health care services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7651.8 - Independent health care services

State Regulations

The department shall require that all independent providers
of health care treatment and services to inmates comply with the pertinent
requirements of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7651.8

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter V
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
